Generation VII.Sun: The dense fog it creates brings the downfall and destruction of its confused enemies. Ocean currents are the source of its energy.
Generation VII.Moon: The guardian deity of Poni, it can control water. People say it can create pure water that will wash away any uncleanness.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: This guardian deity of Poni Island manipulates water. Because it lives deep within a thick fog, it came to be both feared and revered.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Although it's called a guardian deity, terrible calamities sometimes befall those who recklessly approach Tapu Fini.

Generation VII.Sun: Ruins of Hope (after becoming Champion ) ( Only one )
Generation VII.Moon: Ruins of Hope (after becoming Champion ) ( Only one )
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Ruins of Hope (after becoming Champion ) ( Only one )
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Ruins of Hope (after becoming Champion ) ( Only one )

Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure ) ( Only one )
